data.text:
@yasserogier They need to delist a default. The have tried resetting the password a few times. We need to log in to check quick. 

Your questions answered:

Did you try to unlock the user already? Yes
Please also confirm if this is a Legal Suite issue? Not as far as we are aware. Query is regarding defaults which is not part of the legal suite integration.
Is the user still supposed to be active on V1? No, as mentioned this is just to check on a historical default in order to delist. Client is active on V2.
